Reviews.Title: Awesome phone, incremental upgrade from SIII
Reviews.Author: rpv

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo2DAI6JIZZ58XIcurrentClick) { return cv_mo2DAI6JIZZ58XIcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 5:26 MinsI have used Galaxy S3, Note II and for me S4 is more like a S3s :) If you have a Galaxy S3, it is perfect and there is no need to move to S4. The new features are more like minor upgrades for me. Just like Detroit rolls out new cars every year, phone manufacturers have found excellent way to make yearly upgrades.Battery came for almost a day. The video playback was crisp and my friend was amazed at the customization options. It is heaven for a iphone user to come out of shackles and explores the wonderful world of Android. It sure sounds like it is for geeks, but Samsung has created lot of ways to simplify and make it less intimidating. The EASY mode is for one such reason. Samsung's addition of all those apps (commonly referred as crapware) is not as bad as HTC or LG. Android experience is classified as pure vanilla in phones like Nexus. Vendors like Samsung have added a whole lot of extra programs.5" HD Super AMOLED 1920 x 1080 display (441 ppi) is just plain gorgeous. 13 MP camera takes ginormous image sizes. I put a 64 GB microSDXC card SanDisk 64GB Mobile Ultra MicroSDXC Class 6 Memory Card with SD Adapter - Retail Packaging as my friend wants to take lot of movies (built-in 2 GB RAM, 16 GB ROM). No stuttering, and very smooth playback of videos captured in varying light conditions (HD Playback; HD Recording). Compatible video types are AVI/DIVX, WMV/ASF, FLV, MKV, MP4/3GP, WEBM. HDR and Panaromic photos were incredibly sharp. Compatible audio types are: AAC, AMR, MP3, OGG, WMA/ASF, 3GA/M4A, FLAC, WAV. Google Music, PlayerPro Music player are producing excellent music. Audio/Video is one section where S4 has nudged S3. For a normal user, if you are not into lot of video processing this does not matter.S4's infrared sensor is the same technology as TV remote control, so with WatchON you can change the TV channel from your phone. My friend was shocked to see this feature. Having used Android for a long time, I explored all new features one by one. My friend is still getting used to and feels this is too complicated. I broke down into lot of sub features and told my friend he may not use 50% of features, but told him to explore one feature at a time and focus on that.Games were very buttery, this phones runs ARM®-based octa-core mobile CPU. This is apparently world's first! Inside this chip is Imagination Technologies' PowerVR SGX544MP3 GPU. I tried several car racing games and performance was phenomenal. People on the XDA-Developers forum report seeing smearing and ghosting when scrolling on the phone. This especially occurs to people when scrolling among darker colors, which begin showing up as purple. I tried hard to see if I could on the S4 I was testing with my friend and I could not see it. I am sure these can be upgraded with software over due course.Air View and Air Gestures - are they worth it? Air view is similar to how the S-pen on the Galaxy Note 8 works. Simply hover finger a few millimeters above the screen and in supported apps, you'll see a preview of content. This works with many of Samsung's built-in apps, including the photo gallery, the dialer, Samsung's browser and email client. It also works with Flipboard. Air View works by cranking up the capacitive sensor on the screen. Another new feature is Air Gestures. This uses the IR sensor on the top of the phone to detect movement by your palm or finger. One can flip between open tabs in Samsung's browser app, skip to a new song in the music player and do many other things. I say these are still in works and sometimes not very efficient.GPS was spot on and I tried multiple GPS apps. It was bright outdoors (had to crank the brightness all the way up). I tried multiple apps to demonstrate to my friend. In the end, my friend was impressed with what all Android and in particular S4 had to offer. Smooth and Stunning display!I tried following apps and they just worked awesome.Amazon MobileAndroid StatusAndroidifyAngry Birds (Space/Seasons)Asphalt 7Amazon App StoreBoxCar Maintenance Reminder ProChromeCNET TVNAVIGON (from Garmin - offline maps)Google Navigation/Earth/MapsGoogle Currents (nice way to read News)Draw SomethingGoogle DriveEbayLinkedinGoogle MusicTapatalk (awesome forum browsing app)OverDrive Media Console: Library eBooks & Audiobooks (public library consumption of media)Microsoft One Note (legacy docs, skydrive of 25 GB is good)Subsonic Music StreamerTerminal Emulator (still need to use vi, yes this is it)TweetCaster Pro for Android (excellent twitter client)Twit.TvGoogle VoicePlenty of WidgetsAsk questions, the review cannot do justice to Galaxy S4. I will be glad to answer any questions.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic phone, need personal help with music
Reviews.Author: Christine Slocum
Reviews.Content: I was an Apple gal, phone and all, till I bought my S3 on a wicked deal. Turns out, I am a Galaxy gal!!! Having owned both the S3 and now the 4, I would say that is not a noticeable difference between the two, but the S4 is fantastic for all the same reasons. I like the size and it's functionality. The weight seems like a lot at first but you will adjust quickly... I have found my S4 to be tougher than any other phone I have owned, and I am notoriously tough on phones. I finally put a case on it and I feel much better! I took off one star for my own stupidity. I am not very smart technologically and I cannot figure out how to save my music on my phone, using wifi, cord or anything. I realize this is not necessarily Samsung's fault, but... I would like a simpler, more stream lined means of doing so...

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Aramaxis Zabala
Reviews.Content: Everything was as expected except that I thought the phone would be ready for use....just pop in your SIM card and done....however, I still had to go through the process of getting an unlock code so that I could use it with any SIM card. Aside from that, the phone is great. I got the exclusive color without the contract.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: This phone is the best cell phone I have ever had. I had been an iPhone user since iPhone 3 and used the 4 and 4s versions but the Galaxy blows it away. Getting used to the new app store was a little bit different but the phone screen size, speed of the phone and overall widgets/apps make this the best phone. Plus the way you are able to completely customize the phone not only for appearance, but voice commands, air motions and have the phone respond is way ahead of iPhone. Get this phone, I was on the bubble about switching from apple but I am very glad I did.

Reviews.Title: Great Smart Phone
Reviews.Author: Larry K. Mcmains
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone. The display is very good, battery life is good. Audio quality is very good. I use it as a phone, for saving contacts, checking email, text messaging, missed calls and voicemails at home (the xfinity app is very good) and selected apps (bird identification, calculators, online chess, ...) I guess my only complaint is that it comes with many apps, and is continually trying to update them, that I'm not interested in at all (chats, music, hangouts, magazines, ....) that I wish I could remove.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone -  but only a marginal upgrade from S3
Reviews.Author: Wes G.
Reviews.Content: Let me start this review by saying that make no mistake - this is an excellent phone and you will not be disappointed with it unless you were expecting more than just a light refresh of what made the S3 such a great handset. The S4 has somewhat more gimmicky features, but also packs a better assortment of hardware parts as well. I bought this phone for my fiance so I cannot say how it performs daily, but when compared to my S3, it is a small bit faster and sleeker. All in all, this was a great purchase and I would recommend a phone in the galaxy family if you are looking for a great all-rounder.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: The Dreamer
Reviews.Content: The only feature I miss in this phone is Google Now (Siri equivalent). Touch Wiz is bloated as everyone knows. Also like the camera and option of adding a microSD card

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: MARCIE TURNER
Reviews.Content: I love the Galaxy S4, Love the color, I got red...So far no complaints i have only had it a week. But I have the Galaxy S2 and had it for over 3 years... its still a great phone, just giving it to my husband cause he knew I wanted a S4...

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: matthew j Pfeiffer
Reviews.Content: Thus far it is working great! I have had no problems what so ever. Nothing to complain about I love it!

Reviews.Title: Don't hesitate, buy it!!
Reviews.Author: stella
Reviews.Content: Sooooo much better than iPhone!!!! The screen is so clear and bright, no more squinting to read online. So much faster!! There is so much more this phone can do that iPhone doesn't. It's like Apple is trying to keep up with Android!

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Micheal McCamey
Reviews.Content: This was a fair priced item. It came fast and as described. I would buy one again if I needed another one. It was cheaper than at the ATT store.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S4
Reviews.Author: Sandra Kay Herrera
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific telephone.  My husband and I both love it.  I recommended it to my sister and so she and her husband got the telephone as well and they love it.  There are still so many things that it does not we have not discovered yet.  It is fun to learn something about it each and every day.

Reviews.Title: SUPER!!!!
Reviews.Author: Shoe Lover Grandma
Reviews.Content: Very light, wonderfully user friendly.  If you do not want to deal with the idiosyncratic quirks of Apple, Itunes, etc.  this is the phone!

Reviews.Title: I love it!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Colby Pruitt
Reviews.Content: i love my phone its everything i was hoping it would be im very glad i decided to order it. i would refer everyone i know to get this phone and i got it for an amazing price too.

Reviews.Title: awesome!!
Reviews.Author: T. C.
Reviews.Content: Great phone, love it. I was scared at first to purchase it. So I asked questions regarding it and got great results.

Reviews.Title: love it so far.
Reviews.Author: C. Cook
Reviews.Content: I got my new Galaxy 4 about a month ago. Still getting used to the many options. So far not disappointed. Upgraded from a blackberry, not many similarities so steep learning curve.

Reviews.Title: s4
Reviews.Author: Eli
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this phone. .it came exactly when it said it would...i love it. Lighter than I originally expected but I haven't ran into any problems

Reviews.Title: It's everything you need in a cell phone
Reviews.Author: Aj "andrew warren"
Reviews.Content: Great phone ..love it ..it's everything u need in a cell phone ...Thank u Samsung and amazon..for such a great item

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Graceann gardner
Reviews.Content: Recently switched from Iphone 5 and Im in love! Just took some getting use to. You can do so much more.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Phone...
Reviews.Author: Edwin Davila
Reviews.Content: Good speed, no glitches or lag.Very sharp looking screen, and big enough to read.Works well with the open window flip cover from Samsung.The 13 MP Camera takes very sharp photos and excellent HD Video.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Phone...
Reviews.Author: Edwin Davila
Reviews.Content: Good speed, no glitches or lag.Very sharp looking screen, and big enough to read.Works well with the open window flip cover from Samsung.The 13 MP Camera takes very sharp photos and excellent HD Video.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: J. Fuller
Reviews.Content: This is my first Samsung Phone.  I ordered it from Amazon because it was half the price that ATT wanted for it.  I bought 2 phones for the price of one.  The other phone belongs to my 80+ mother.  It was easy for her to use.  She loves it

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Linda Luster
Reviews.Content: Nice phone I used the iPhone for 4 years but this one is much bigger and I like that alot

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: M. Booth
Reviews.Content: I was torn between this and the iphone and got this because of a special. I wouldn't trade it ever. My sister got an iphone and when comparing it does everything the phone does and the picture is a lot better. Now that I have it I wouldn't trade it for anything. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Cell!
Reviews.Author: HOLLIDAY101
Reviews.Content: Nothing but Great! The GS4 is as advertised and so far, I love all aspects of my phone. Highly recommend owning one if you are considering a switch or an upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Loved it but so sorry!
Reviews.Author: TCZ_inSJ
Reviews.Content: This phone is amazing with features that make you wonder if you ever ...ever need an upgrade.  But as a senior citizen who no long have to go out & communicate with people as in the old days, I cannot afford monthly bills in the next two years ...so with regret, I finally had to return it on the 14th days trying allowable by AT&T;

Reviews.Title: The phone you want on any service you want.
Reviews.Author: Jordan Givens "JGiv"
Reviews.Content: Short anad simple. It's the exclusive red S4 without the AT&T; contract you may not want. We all know the specs and reviews by now. Get the color you want on the service you want, like Metro PCS. :)

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "hanatoly"
Reviews.Content: Excellent gadget. Smooth transition from iPhone. The screen size, the camera and the variety of features and the ease with which they are installed were the selling point.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Claudeth V. Forbin "rabid reader"
Reviews.Content: Even though I have had various Samsung phones, I have always been somewhat conflicted.  The apps are great.  But the battery life absolutely sucks.  It's early yet, but I can get through an entire day on one charge; even with downloading.  So on battery life, check.  The preinstalled apps are ok.  Wish I could delete them.  But that is standard with any phone.All in all, I am loving my new phone.  The color rocks and the price through Amazon has all my friends just green.  Whoop Whoop!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S4
Reviews.Author: Vickie S. Curran
Reviews.Content: Samsung Galaxy S4It's much better than my last phone.  It lets me know when I have a message and when I have a call.  I also can see what the weather is like with it.  I can also use it in my car with blue tooth.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Willard31
Reviews.Content: I first orderd the galaxy s3. Well that phone was crap, it was slow and all the features didmt work. I ordered the lg optimus g pro next. While that phone was great, I started reading about how Lg doesn't update their phones. I sent it back and I got this phone. The red is beautiful and it's fast and all features work great!! Love it

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: M. Flores "Lisa"
Reviews.Content: Love, love love it! Also love the color, even thought I usually buy them in black. I wasn't sure I'd like it, but it looks great and works well coming off the S2.

Reviews.Title: Delighted Daughter
Reviews.Author: love to read
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my daughter and she loves this phone. The fact that it comes in one of her favorite colors was just a plus.  It is everything she wanted in a phone and she is so happy which makes me so happy.  Great purchase

Reviews.Title: Luv my Samsung s4
Reviews.Author: MT
Reviews.Content: I've only had my S4 phone a few weeks.  It was time for my upgrade and I saw phone on Amazon and upgraded.  Price was right for my budget.  It was delivered exactly at time that was given to me.  Luv the service on line ordering.  Phone is great.  Lots of features I'm still learning.  Having a ball with this phone.

Reviews.Title: My phone
Reviews.Author: C. Burpo
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed getting to know my phone.  I lost my sheet showing the features though.  Can I get another copy?  The one that shows how to use those features.

Reviews.Title: I love my Samsung Galaxy s4
Reviews.Author: Karen Mentzer
Reviews.Content: I love this phone...I am not turning on my computer till later in the day now since I can access everything I did before. No sure if it is Samsung or AT&T; is responsible for the only problem I have but the thing i hate is I have to turn the data ON to send or receive a text with pix or video :-(  I mainly use this phone wifi.

Reviews.Title: Great phone at a good price.
Reviews.Author: G. Watson "gadget nut"
Reviews.Content: I really like the Galaxy S4.  It has lots of features and I haven't used many of them yet.  I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: just great
Reviews.Author: wolf "wolf"
Reviews.Content: I had the note before this, which while it was great, i actually appreciated the slightly smaller g4 and drop it less. the note cracks easily. Also is a more well designed and integrated model, faster. and, I like the look. the only thing I hate is the button layout.

Reviews.Title: Wife gift
Reviews.Author: Robert Hankins
Reviews.Content: Loves the size of the S4, the speed of the processor and camera and added bonus.  Switch from the iPhone 4s a good item, but the screen size not as clear as the S4.

Reviews.Title: Love my Galaxy 4
Reviews.Author: Patty Greer
Reviews.Content: I already owned a DROID so the Galaxy was an easy transition.  I love the large screen and beautiful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful smartphone and completely satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Gordo
Reviews.Content: Very nice smartphone and a big improvement upgrading from the Samsung Infuse.  The screen display is beautiful and the HD camera takes great pictures.  I can't speak for a lot of the features because I don't use them.  Primary reason I upgraded to this phone is for the little bigger screen display & better camera.  Completely satisfied with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Like it.
Reviews.Author: S. Norris
Reviews.Content: I like it. The only thing that I hate is that it doesn't have the red eye editing. You have to download some other app for that.

Reviews.Title: WARNING
Reviews.Author: Dave B
Reviews.Content: This uses a different sized SIM card then any other Android phone in the world,  a micro. If you follow the AT&T; procedure, you have to stop using any other phone for their service. Nobody tells you this up front, neither AT&T; nor Amazon. I bought this because I renewed my 2 year contract and was subsidizing the cost of the phone anyway; I haven't used it yet because I'm waiting for an adaptor that will supposedly let the micro SIM card also be used in my other phones that take the standard SIM card. All of the eye detection functions on the phone do not work if you wear glasses and they do absolutely nothing when I take my glasses off. Air gestures do practically nothing, even if I wave my hand back and forth across the sensor numerous times; just use a stylus if you don't want to touch the screen.

Reviews.Title: red is pretty
Reviews.Author: Owen L. Powell
Reviews.Content: I battery life short.No real operators manual.Process do not appear the same in different programs. Better reception than expected.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: ken gross
Reviews.Content: It would literally take a lifetime to figure out everything that this phone is capable of. A plethora of features, menus and settings, but it's all relatively easy to understand and use. At least twenty times more complex than my ten year old daughters iPhone 4s, which we figured out completely in the first couple hours she had it.. It's kind of cool to own a device that has features way beyond anything I'll ever need to comprehend..

Reviews.Title: Galaxy s4
Reviews.Author: Samantha palomo
Reviews.Content: i really love the way this phone is... i had gs3 on sprint network and it waz crap. its fast the battery life is average... im a heavy user and its prettyy good with the battery....last me up until bedtime.

Reviews.Title: comfortable
Reviews.Author: tine wullur
Reviews.Content: The best for me , n I like it very much .... cause the screen is big enough for me

Reviews.Title: dislike
Reviews.Author: dora
Reviews.Content: It feels cheap, the button sticks, it flashes then the.screen shrinks. I hate the fact that att gave me 14 days and amazon gave  30 but if I return it it costs me a 325.00  fee. I loved my HTC oneX and I absolutely hate this phone I am.stuck with.

Reviews.Title: Get phone through att and get free galaxy note 8.0 with it.
Reviews.Author: Christopher Carter
Reviews.Content: Like so far compared to whati had. Stay away from lg nock off. And the sg4 came with free tablet so can't complain. I don't give out five stars unless I'm truely inpressed and that rare. But if you can get with tablet free through att it worth it. The tablet is a roughly a 400 dollar tablet so you do the math.

Reviews.Title: US DHS and FBI warn of Android security threats - has most viruses.  not safe for banking or personal use
Reviews.Author: Hugh
Reviews.Content: Linked from The Inquirer, tech news page: [...]THE UNITED STATES Department of Homeland Security (DHS) and Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) must have caught up on their IT industry news reading this summer, because they have just warned about security threats to devices that use the Android mobile operating system.A joint DHS-FBI bulletin read, "Android is the world's most widely used mobile operating system (OS) and continues to be a primary target for malware attacks due to its market share and open source architecture. Industry reporting indicates 44 percent of Android users are still using versions 2.3.3 through 2.3.7 - known as Gingerbread - which were released in 2011 and have a number of security vulnerabilities that were fixed in later versions. The growing use of mobile devices by federal, state, and local authorities makes it more important than ever to keep mobile OS patched and up-to-date."The bulletin proceeded to identify SMS Trojans, rootkits and fake Google Play domains as security threats and offered various mitigation strategies.For example, to fight against SMS Trojans it advised, "Install an Android security suite designed to combat these threats. These security suites can be purchased or downloaded free from the Internet."To protect against fake domains, "Install only approved applications and follow IT department procedures to update devices' OS. Users should install and regularly update antivirus software for Android devices to detect and remove any malicious applications."The IT industry and tech-savvy users have known about these types of security concerns - stemming from Android fragmentation, most mobile phone manufacturers' sloth and indifference, and user inertia and ignorance - for a while now. But apparently the DHS and FBI just noticed this summer. µ
